Notes: equipped with the EL/W-2090 radar. 2 more planned.
Operated by Aviation Research Centre (ARC) of R&AW.
Used as Air India One for presidential flight
To be replaced by EADS CASA C-295
license-built by HAL. A fleet of around 120 aircraft.

Developed by DRDO and KDS
Multiple variants; Weight - 15 to 120 kg; Warhead - 2 to 40 kg; Max. Endurance - 12 hrs; Max. Range - 150 to 300 km; Canister launched and vertical take-off and landing (VTOL) variants
